channel.title: Client wont start
channel.description:
whenever i try running my client i am using 508 fearnscape source it says The system could not find the path specified Exception in the thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError : palidino76/rs2/server
and it says other stuff as well
heres whats in the run @echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause
which is what supposed to be used from the topic. And the compiler and the server both work just the client some plz help :eek:

item.title: Client wont start
item.dc:creator: @hgfdg hgfdg
item.description:
@hgfdg wrote:

whenever i try running my client i am using 508 fearnscape source it says
The system could not find the path specified
Exception in the thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError : palidino76/rs2/server

and it says other stuff as well

heres whats in the run
@echo off
cd …/bin
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe” palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
pause

which is what supposed to be used from the topic. And the compiler and the server both work just the client
some plz help :eek:
